name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Route AZKi 3D Acoustic LIVE 「Route If」アルバムリリース記念ライブ【#ルートAZKiライブ】 [0NXvBO1E6fM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: AZKi continues her performance of the song "Dawn and Fireflies" (夜明けと蛍) accompanied by a pianist and a guitarist on a night stage under strings of lights.
AZKi performs a cover of "Ghost in a Flower" (花に亡霊) by Yorushika. The song title and credits appear on-screen at the start of the performance.

subtitles.original: 形のない
subtitles.english: With formless...

subtitles.original: 歌で朝を描いたまま
subtitles.english: ...songs, while painting the morning,

subtitles.original: 浅い浅い夏の向こうに
subtitles.english: beyond the shallow, shallow summer,

subtitles.original: 冷たくない君の手のひらが見えた
subtitles.english: I saw your hand, and it wasn't cold.

subtitles.original: 淡い空明けの蛍
subtitles.english: A firefly in the pale morning sky.

subtitles.original: 自分勝手な幸せに怯えるほど
subtitles.english: As much as I fear a selfish happiness,

subtitles.original: 嫌いなものが増えたので
subtitles.english: the things I dislike have grown,

subtitles.original: 地球の裏側へ飛びたいのだ
subtitles.english: so I want to fly to the other side of the Earth.

subtitles.original: 無人の駅に届くまで
subtitles.english: Until I reach an unmanned station.

subtitles.original: 昨日の僕に出会うまで
subtitles.english: Until I meet the me of yesterday.

subtitles.original: 胸が痛いから下を向くたびに
subtitles.english: Every time I look down because my chest hurts,

subtitles.original: 君がまた遠くへ行くんだ
subtitles.english: you go further away again.

subtitles.original: 夢を見たい僕らを汚せ
subtitles.english: Soil us, who want to dream.

subtitles.original: さらば昨日の夜に咲く火の花
subtitles.english: Farewell, the flowers of fire blooming in yesterday's night.

subtitles.original: 水に映る花を 花を見ていた
subtitles.english: I was looking at the flowers reflected in the water.

subtitles.original: 水に霞む月を 月を見ていた
subtitles.english: I was looking at the moon hazy in the water.

subtitles.original: から
subtitles.english: Because...

subtitles.original: 夏が来ないままの空を描いたなら
subtitles.english: if I painted a sky where summer never comes,

subtitles.original: 君は僕を笑うだろうか
subtitles.english: would you laugh at me?

subtitles.original: 明け方の夢を被る月が見えた
subtitles.english: I saw the moon wearing a dream of dawn.

subtitles.original: 空
subtitles.english: The sky.

subtitles.original: 朝が来ないままで息ができたなら
subtitles.english: If I could breathe without the morning ever coming,

subtitles.original: 遠い遠い夏の向こうへ
subtitles.english: beyond the far, far summer,

subtitles.original: 冷たくない君の手のひらが見えた
subtitles.english: I saw your hand, and it wasn't cold.

subtitles.original: 淡い朝焼けの夜空
subtitles.english: The night sky in the pale dawn.

subtitles.original: 夏が来ないままの街を今
subtitles.english: Right now, through the city where summer never comes,

subtitles.original: 藍の夜明けと蛍
subtitles.english: the indigo dawn and fireflies.

subtitles.original: もう忘れてしまったかな 夏の木陰に座ったまま
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've already forgotten, sitting in the shade,

subtitles.original: 花に亡霊
subtitles.english: Ghost in a Flower

subtitles.original: 作詞作曲 n-buna
subtitles.english: Written and Composed by n-buna

subtitles.original: アイスを口に放り込んで 風を待っていた
subtitles.english: popping ice cream into our mouths and waiting for the wind.

subtitles.original: もう忘れてしまったかな 世の中の全部嘘だらけ
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've already forgotten, the world full of lies,

subtitles.original: 本当の価値を二人で探しに行こうと笑ったこと
subtitles.english: and how we laughed, saying let's find the true value together.

subtitles.original: 忘れないように
subtitles.english: So that I don't forget.

subtitles.original: 色褪せないように
subtitles.english: So that it doesn't fade.

subtitles.original: 形に残るものが全てじゃないように
subtitles.english: So that things with form aren't everything.

subtitles.original: 言葉をもっと教えて 夏が来るって教えて
subtitles.english: Teach me more words, tell me that summer is coming.

subtitles.original: 僕は描いてる 眼に映ったのは夏の亡霊だ
subtitles.english: I'm painting it; what was in my eyes was the ghost of summer.

subtitles.original: 風にスカートが揺れて 思い出なんて忘れて
subtitles.english: With the skirt swaying in the wind, forget the memories.

subtitles.original: 浅い呼吸をする 汗を拭う
subtitles.english: Taking shallow breaths, wiping away the sweat.
